name: Hop's Journey
description:
Spacebar jumps! Click green objects to move them.

To be clear, this was a quick and dirty upload to web, just for people without an Android device to get an idea for what my game is. It plays much better on a phone with touch controls, and is quite frankly pretty difficult to play with a mouse. This port to the web browser has NOT been memory managed at all whatsoever. It's entirely possible the game will throw a memory error if your computer or browser does not have 512mb of RAM available. 

Please download from the Play store for a better experience, the web version will not be maintained.
